mapper.sql: id, user_id, card_id, quality, ease_factor_before, ease_factor_after, interval_before, interval_after, review_time, time_spent_ms
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO flashcard_review_log (user_id, card_id, quality, ease_factor_before, ease_factor_after, interval_before, interval_after, review_time, time_spent_ms) VALUES (#{userId}, #{cardId}, #{quality}, #{easeFactorBefore}, #{easeFactorAfter}, #{intervalBefore}, #{intervalAfter}, #{reviewTime}, #{timeSpentMs})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM flashcard_review_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND card_id = #{cardId} ORDER BY review_time DESC
